title: What will be the effect of Eric Schmidt's resignation as Google CEO? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hao Li of the Internaional Business Times  writes that  "[The problem of Google and Eric Schmidt] is shared by several declining tech giants and their corporate CEOs (namely Microsoft post-Bill Gates and Apple post-Steve Jobs). Parr  [of Mashable] said Schmidt is a great CEO, manager, and executive.  Thanks to him, Google is efficiently run.  However, Schmidt isn't a "visionary" like Mark Zuckerberg of Facebook, Bill Gates of Microsoft, or Steve Jobs of Apple."  Read more of "Why typical CEOs fail at tech companies (and why Page replaced Schmidt at Google)" at http://goo.gl/Aiw5d
There is also a decent article on Sergey's new role as CEO at Google from the Wall Street Journal here Would Google be what it is today without Eric Schmidt as CEO for the last 10 years?
